title: Let’s Go to the Live!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Tomorrow is finally the day of Aqours’ live, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Everyone, go get your stuff ready by today, okay? Let’s not forget anything.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Huh? Whose lightstick is this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ah, that’s mine....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You truly are Nico-chan, aren’t you....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What is that supposed to mean!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey, hey! Rin will be bringing 9 lightsticks nya! How about everyone?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I’ve prepared some too, of course.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’m also all set!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re always so quick for things like this, Honoka....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It was like this too on every field trip back in elementary, wasn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Is that so? Then I guess I must’ve been very organized since I was a kid~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I don’t think that’s what Umi is saying....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you, Maki. As long as you understand it, it’s enough.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Come on, what are you guys yapping for? We will now start discussing how we’ll meet up tomorrow!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
